short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hack your Eat Club by filtering menu items: Show only gluten-free options… Or show vegetarian or vegan options that aren’t spicy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hack your Eat Club by filtering menu items. You can show only gluten-free options. Or, you could show only vegetarian or vegan options while suppressing spicy food. Maybe you want to hide “big portion” meals to avoid tempting yourself? You’re the boss. 

There are two other little features, too: 

- Sold-out items are suppressed
- When you scroll down, the massive Eat Club header shrinks to half its size.

FEEDback is welcome. Here’s how to make friends:

- Send me suggestions and bugs privately
- If you love it, publicly give it 5 stars
- Share it

FORK it:
https://github.com/alanhogan/cheat-club
